mapper.select: select promotion_sku.id, promotion_id promotionId, promotion_sku.sku, discount, name, price, state, sprice, model, brand, image from promotion_sku LEFT JOIN aoyi_prod_index on promotion_sku.sku = aoyi_prod_index.sku where promotion_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from promotion_sku where sku = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and promotion_id = #{promotionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into promotion_sku (id, promotion_id, sku, discount) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{promotionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
